results.title: Googleâ€™s Shadow Work Force: Temps Who Outnumber Full-Time Employees
results.abstract: The tech company has long used contractors, but some employees worry that a growing reliance on them represents a shifting, less admirable work culture.

results.title: Huawei Ban Threatens Wireless Service in Rural Areas
results.abstract: Many small carriers depend on inexpensive equipment from the Chinese company. Now they must rethink expansion plans, and perhaps replace existing gear.
